div.h2: HL7 V2 Table 0203 - Identifier Type (AU Extended)
div.p: HL7 V2 table 0203 extensions for Australian use

title.value: HL7 V2 Table 0203 - Identifier Type (AU Extended)

description.value: Extended concept codes for identifier type for use in Australian context.

copyright.value: HL7 AustraliaÂ© 2018+; Licensed Under Creative Commons No Rights Reserved.

display.value: Australian Health Practitioner Regulation Agency Registration Number

definition.value: Australian Health Practitioner Regulation Agency allocated registration number
A My Health Record assigned Care Agency Employee Identifier is issued to an employee of, or person under contracted arrangement with, a Care Agency that participates in the My Health Record.
Department of Veterans' Affairs Number (Gold Card)
Department of Veterans' Affairs Number (Lilac Card)
Department of Veterans' Affairs Number (Orange Card)
Department of Veterans' Affairs Number (White Card)
Identifier allocated by an ETP supplier, sometimes related to a barcorde.
Local dispensing identifier
Local requester system identifier for prescriptions
An identifier assigned by Services Australia to uniquely identify practice sites that provide diagnostic imaging and radiation oncology services.
A National Association of Testing Authorities (NATA) accreditation number associated with an accredited facility. A NATA accreditation number is associated with an organisation.

A National Association of Testing Authorities (NATA) site number associated with an accredited facility. A NATA site number represents a specific location associated with an accredited facility, i.e. an organisation with a NATA accreditation number.
Nationally assigned device identifier, that is commonly a PAI-D
Nationally assigned organisation identifier, that is commonly a HPI-O
National provider at organisation identifier; combined identifier [HPI-I]@[HPI-O]
Nationally assigned repository identifier, that is commonly a PAI-R
Medicare assigned prescriber number for a practitioner
Seniors healthcare card number assigned by Department of Health and Human Services
Location specific Medicare Provider Number
A unique vendor identifier allocated to a provider directory entry (PractitionerRole or HealthcareService), typically used for routing secure messages
